subject: Women
News and News Media
organizations: Hall of Fame of the National Sportscasters and Sportswriters Association
lead_paragraph: Mary Garber will be inducted Monday into the Hall of Fame of the National Sportscasters and Sportswriters Association, as a pioneer among female sportswriters, among all of us.
snippet: Mary Garber will be inducted Monday into the Hall of Fame of the National Sportscasters and Sportswriters Association, as a pioneer among female sportswriters, among all of us.
